title: Unexpected panic while running cargo check
body:
I get an unexpected panic while running cargo check on the following code:

```rust
extern crate csv;
extern crate rustc_serialize;

fn main() {
}
```

My cargo.toml contains the following dependencies:

```
[dependencies]
csv = "0.14"
```

If I add the rustc_serialize crate to my cargo.toml, I can succesfully run the command.

If I run cargo run, I get an error message indicating that the crate rustc_serialize is not found.
I would expect the same to happen when I run cargo check.



The following backtrace is printed when running cargo check:

